originalTitle: 'Half of my friends were killed' - the girls returning to a school caught up in war
title: 'Half of my friends were killed' - the girls returning to a school caught up in war
content: Twins whose classmates were killed by shelling say their deaths have made them determined to finish their studies.

originalTitle: Mandela's prison key, sunglasses and shirt can be sold after daughter wins court battle
title: Mandela's prison key, sunglasses and shirt can be sold after daughter wins court battle
content: The authorities tried to stop their export arguing they were part of the country's heritage.

originalTitle: Somaliland president pitches business opportunities to Trump's son
title: Somaliland president pitches business opportunities to Trump's son
content: He also met his counterpart from Israel which has recognised the independence of the breakaway region.

originalTitle: Iran rejects UN rights resolution condemning protest killings
title: Iran rejects UN rights resolution condemning protest killings
content: A prosecutor said at least twice more people were killed in Iran in half the time compared with the Srebrenica genocide.

originalTitle: Bangladesh out of T20 World Cup after ICC’s refusal to change venues
title: Bangladesh out of T20 World Cup after ICC’s refusal to change venues
content: Scotland replace Bangladesh after the BCB's request to relocate its games from India is turned down by the ICC.

originalTitle: Israeli drone strike kills two children collecting firewood in Gaza
title: Israeli drone strike kills two children collecting firewood in Gaza
content: The attack hits civilians gathering firewood near Kamal Adwan Hospital in northern Gaza, sources say.

originalTitle: Trump threatens Canada with 100% tariffs over China trade deal
title: Trump threatens Canada with 100% tariffs over China trade deal
content: Trump made the threat in a social media post as tensions rise between the US and its northern neighbour.

originalTitle: Two days of peace talks end as Russia continues Ukraine attacks
title: Two days of peace talks end as Russia continues Ukraine attacks
content: There is no apparent breakthrough as the three-way talks conclude and Russia maintains its bombardment.

originalTitle: How Soviet urban planning is helping Russia freeze Ukraine
title: How Soviet urban planning is helping Russia freeze Ukraine
content: Thousands of people are affected when heating plants are targeted by Russian forces.

originalTitle: German FA official wants World Cup boycott talks
title: German FA official wants World Cup boycott talks
content: A German football association official believes it is time to consider a boycott of the 2026 World Cup in the wake of United States President Donald Trump's actions.

originalTitle: Tottenham, Bayern and a stand made of chairs - Palhinha's story
title: Tottenham, Bayern and a stand made of chairs - Palhinha's story
content: On-loan Tottenham midfielder Joao Palhinha chats to BBC Sport's Kelly Somers about his life and career.

originalTitle: Euros abuse made me not want to leave hotel - Carter
title: Euros abuse made me not want to leave hotel - Carter
content: England defender Jess Carter says abuse of female footballers is getting worse and that she has had to step back from social media after receiving racist messages during Euro 2025.
